name: The Devourer
desc:
You call forth a devourer, a creature made of a void of magic. It hunts a 30 foot radius around itself for any existing spell effect with the Summoning tag. If a spell effect with that tag is in the area, or is cast in the area, the devourer immediately rushes to it and devours it whole, dealing 4d8 psychic damage to its caster and ending the effect immediately.

At the start of each of your turns, the area of the devourer increases by 30 feet.

If a devourer meets another devourer, they clash and destroy each other, dealing 12d8 psychic damage to their casters.

You can't end this spell early.
author: CrusaderDroid
